C

Client - Class in de.socketfiles.client
Client class, that manages the socket and all direct requests and answers from/to the server Works without the GUI Main class example: public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException, InterruptedException { Client c = new Client("localhost", 1337, "Stefan"); c.connect(); c.sendFile(new File("tes.txt")); c.close(); System.out.println("Connection closed."); }
Client(String, int, String) - Constructor for class de.socketfiles.client.Client
Client constructor Creates the input handler thread and initializes variables
client - Static variable in class de.socketfiles.client.ClientLogic
Client instance
ClientInfo - Class in de.socketfiles
ClientInfo class Wrapper for a socket that is used by the Server and the Client
ClientInfo(Socket, Server) - Constructor for class de.socketfiles.ClientInfo
ClientInfo constructor
ClientLogic - Class in de.socketfiles.client
Contains the client instance and methods to interact with it
ClientLogic() - Constructor for class de.socketfiles.client.ClientLogic
 
clients - Variable in class de.socketfiles.Server
List of currently connected clients
close() - Method in class de.socketfiles.client.Client
Tries to inform the server about the disconnect and closes the socket
close() - Static method in class de.socketfiles.client.ClientLogic
closes the client socket
connect() - Method in class de.socketfiles.client.Client
Tries to connect to the specified server and updates information
